name: Run Robot Run
description:
FEATURES

  • 4 characters, each with an unique skill
  • Amazing power-ups
  • Beautiful HD graphics

CONTROLS

  • Robot's movement - Navigation keys
  • Pause - Pause key
  • Item supply (gas) - Number key 1
  • Item supply (clock) - Number key 2
  • Item supply (coin) - Number key 3
  • Item supply (block) - Number key 4
